# Makefile for building hello.exe
# Generated by tmake at 00:20, 2003/09/16
#     Project: hello.pro
#    Template: app

####### Compiler, tools and options

CC	=	cl
CXX	=	cl
CFLAGS	=	-nologo -W3 -O1 -GX -DNO_DEBUG
CXXFLAGS=	-nologo -W3 -O1 -GX -DNO_DEBUG
INCPATH	=	-I$(QTDIR)\include
LINK	=	link
LFLAGS	=	/NOLOGO /incremental:no /nodefaultlib:"libcmt" /SUBSYSTEM:windows
LIBS	=	 $(QTDIR)\lib\qt.lib kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib imm32.lib winmm.lib wsock32.lib comctl32.lib
MOC	=	$(QTDIR)\bin\moc.exe
UIC	=	$(QTDIR)\bin\uic.exe
REMOVE	=	-del
RMDIR	=	-rmdir /q /s
ZIP	=	zip -r -9

####### Files

HEADERS =	hello.h
SOURCES =	hello.cpp \
		main.cpp
OBJECTS =	hello.obj \
		main.obj
INTERFACES =	
UICDECLS =	
UICIMPLS =	
SRCMOC	=	moc_hello.cpp
OBJMOC	=	moc_hello.obj
DIST	=	
TARGET	=	hello.exe
INTERFACE_DECL_PATH = .

####### Implicit rules

.SUFFIXES: .cpp .cxx .cc .C .c

.cpp.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -Fo$@ $<

.cxx.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -Fo$@ $<

.cc.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -Fo$@ $<

.C.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -Fo$@ $<

.c.obj:
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -Fo$@ $<

####### Build rules


all: $(TARGET)

$(TARGET): $(UICDECLS) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) 
	$(REMOVE) $(TARGET) 
	$(LINK) $(LFLAGS) /OUT:$(TARGET) @<<
	    $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) $(LIBS)
<<

moc: $(SRCMOC)

tmake:
	tmake hello.pro

dist:
	$(REMOVE) Makefile *.dsp *.dsw *.opt *.ncb *.mak

clean:
	$(REMOVE) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) $(SRCMOC) $(UICIMPLS) $(UICDECLS) $(TARGET)
	$(REMOVE) hello.opt

	$(RMDIR) Debug Release


####### Compile

hello.obj: hello.cpp \
		hello.h

main.obj: main.cpp \
		hello.h

moc_hello.obj: moc_hello.cpp \
		hello.h

moc_hello.cpp: hello.h
	$(MOC) hello.h -o moc_hello.cpp
